Aegis.effect: If foe's Range = 2, reduces damage from that foe's attack by 50%.

Aether.effect: Treats foe’s Def/Res as if reduced by 50% during combat. Restores HP = half of damage dealt.

Black Luna.effect: Treats foe's Def/Res as if reduced by 80% during combat. (Skill cannot be inherited.)

Blazing Flame.effect: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to 1.5 x (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Blazing Light.effect: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to 1.5 x (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Blazing Thunder.effect: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to 1.5 x (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Blazing Wind.effect: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to 1.5 x (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Bonfire.effect: Boosts damage dealt by 50% of unit's Def.

Buckler.effect: Reduces damage from an adjacent foe's attack by 30%.

Chilling Wind.effect: Boosts damage dealt by 50% of unit's Res.

Escutcheon.effect: Reduces damage from an adjacent foe's attack by 30%.

Fire Emblem.effect: Boosts damage dealt by 30% of unit's Spd. Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit and all allies for 1 turn after combat. (Bonus granted to allies even if unit's HP reaches 0.)

Galeforce.effect: If unit initiates combat, grants unit another action after combat. (Once per turn.)

Glacies.effect: Boosts damage dealt by 80% of unit's Res.

Glowing Ember.effect: Boosts damage dealt by 50% of unit's Def.

Growing Flame.effect: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in a wide area around target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Growing Light.effect: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in a wide area around target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Growing Thunder.effect: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in a wide area around target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Growing Wind.effect: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in a wide area around target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Heavenly Light.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, restores 10 HP to all allies.

Holy Vestments.effect: If foe's Range = 2, reduces damage from that foe's attack by 30%.

Ice Mirror.effect: If foe's Range = 2, reduces damage from foe's attacks by 30%. Boosts unit's next attack by total damage reduced (by any source, including other skills) when Special triggers. Resets at end of combat. (Skill cannot be inherited.)

Iceberg.effect: Boosts damage dealt by 50% of unit's Res.

Ignis.effect: Boosts damage dealt by 80% of unit's Def.

Imbue.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, restores an additional 10 HP to target ally.

Kindled-Fire Balm.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Atk+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

Luna.effect: Treats foe’s Def/Res as if reduced by 50% during combat.

Miracle.effect: If unit’s HP > 1 and foe would reduce unit’s HP to 0, unit survives with 1 HP.

Moonbow.effect: Treats foe’s Def/Res as if reduced by 30% during combat.

New Moon.effect: Treats foe’s Def/Res as if reduced by 30% during combat.

Pavise.effect: Reduces damage from an adjacent foe's attack by 50%.

Radiant Aether.effect: During combat, treats foe's Def/Res as if reduced by 50%. Restores HP = 50% of damage dealt.

Regnal Astra.effect: Boosts damage dealt by 40% of unit's Spd. (Skill cannot be inherited.)

Reprisal.effect: Grants bonus to damage dealt equal to 30% of damage suffered.

Retribution.effect: Grants bonus to damage dealt equal to 30% of damage suffered.

Rising Flame.effect: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Rising Light.effect: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Rising Thunder.effect: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Rising Wind.effect: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Sacred Cowl.effect: If foe's Range = 2, reduces damage from that foe's attack by 30%.

Solid-Earth Balm.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Def+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

Still-Water Balm.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Res+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

Swift-Winds Balm.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Spd+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

Vengeance.effect: Grants bonus to damage dealt equal to 50% of damage suffered.

Windfire Balm.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Atk/Spd+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

Windfire Balm+.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Atk/Spd+6 to all allies for 1 turn.
